text:
If you’re looking to learn about GA in general, I’d recommend the free Google analytics academy courses. Learn about GTM too if you can! I also liked Jeff Sauer’s Jeffalytics. 

There are a bunch of great courses out there, but nothing better than hands on experience. If you can create a test GTM container and test GA account, do it and start playing around.

elements.text: If you’re looking to learn about GA in general, I’d recommend the free Google analytics academy courses. Learn about GTM too if you can! I also liked Jeff Sauer’s Jeffalytics.
